section.title: Viewing Security Groups
section.para: This procedure describes how to view security groups.

step.para: Click the desired security groups for viewing the details.

listitem.para: In Properties, you can view the basic information of the security group.
In Relationships, you can view the cloud provider and the instances associated with the security group.
In Firewall Rules, you can view a list of ports and IP ranges that are accessible.

note.para: This box is not available if you have not set any rules for your security group.
